name: Abram Lubin
shortBio: Documents stories through visual details and honest composition.
bio: Abram is an accomplished photographer whose work has appeared in editorial campaigns and independent magazines. He writes about visual storytelling, travel, and attention to detail.

name: Giana Franci
shortBio: Explores the intersection of creative work, productivity, and life.
bio: Giana writes weekly about building thoughtful routines and shipping meaningful projects. Her essays blend practical frameworks with clear and human storytelling.

name: Carla Dokidis
shortBio: Brings cultural context and clarity to modern lifestyle topics.
bio: Carla is an award-winning novelist and columnist focused on culture, ethics, and contemporary identity. She helps readers connect everyday choices with bigger social shifts.

name: Daniel Foster
shortBio: Makes complicated technology trends understandable and useful.
bio: Daniel has led editorial and content teams for over a decade. He writes about AI, systems thinking, and the human side of product development.

name: Richard Miller
shortBio: Covers design principles, visual systems, and better digital habits.
bio: Richard is a design writer focused on interface clarity, typography, and creative process. His work translates design concepts into practical decisions for teams.
